text: Steven Michael Robert Howey (born July 12, 1977) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Van Montgomery on The WB/CW television series Reba, and Kevin Ball on the Showtime series Shameless. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Antonio, Texas
title: Steve Howey (actor)
